name: Floral Summer Dress
description: Lightweight cotton dress with vibrant floral print. Features short puff sleeves and a smocked waist for adjustable fit. Perfect for brunches or summer outings.

name: Black Slip Dress
description: Sleek satin slip dress with adjustable spaghetti straps. Lined for opacity with a bias-cut silhouette that flatters all body types. Transition effortlessly from day to night.

name: Denim Shirt Dress
description: Casual button-down dress in medium wash denim. Features chest pockets and a belted waist for definition. Pair with boots for a rugged-chic look.

name: Ruffled Midi Dress
description: Feminine dress with cascading tiered ruffles from waist to hem. Made of lightweight chiffon with a modest neckline. Ideal for garden parties or weddings.

name: Wrap Maxi Dress
description: Flattering v-neck wrap dress in flowy rayon fabric. Self-tie waist accentuates curves while the maxi length elongates. Includes hidden inner snap for security.

name: Velvet Evening Dress
description: Luxurious burgundy velvet gown with square neckline and long sleeves. Features a thigh-high slit and fully lined interior. Makes a statement at formal events.

name: T-Shirt Dress
description: Casual cotton jersey dress with crew neck and short sleeves. Relaxed fit with side pockets for practicality. Perfect with sneakers for weekend errands.

name: Polka Dot Sundress
description: Playful black and white dot dress with smocked bodice. Spaghetti straps and A-line skirt create a retro vibe. Machine washable for easy care.

name: Bodycon Mini Dress
description: Fitted stretchy dress with scoop neck and short sleeves. Contains 5% spandex for comfort and shape retention. Style with heels for night out.

name: Embroidered Boho Dress
description: Hand-embroidered maxi dress with bell sleeves and square neckline. Flowy chiffon fabric moves beautifully. Perfect for music festivals or beach vacations.

name: Silk Button-Down Blouse
description: Luxurious 100% silk blouse with French cuffs. Classic collar and darts for tailored fit. Dry clean only for best maintenance.

name: Cropped Cashmere Sweater
description: Ultra-soft ivory cashmere with ribbed trim. Cropped length pairs perfectly with high-waisted bottoms. Hand wash cold to preserve fibers.

name: Off-Shoulder Ruffled Top
description: Flirty peasant top with elasticized off-shoulder neckline. Voluminous sleeves with delicate ruffles. Made of breathable cotton voile.

name: Graphic Tee
description: 100% cotton tee with vintage-inspired graphic print. Relaxed fit with crew neck. Pre-shrunk fabric maintains shape wash after wash.

name: Turtleneck Bodysuit
description: Slim-fit bodysuit with snap closure at crotch. High neckline and long sleeves for winter. Contains 10% spandex for stretch.

name: Linen Button-Up Shirt
description: Breathable linen shirt with button-front closure. Relaxed fit with curved hem. Wrinkles naturally for casual texture.

name: Wrap Blouse
description: V-neck wrap style top with self-tie waist. Flowy chiffon fabric drapes elegantly. Semi-sheer - wear with camisole for coverage.

name: Sequined Party Top
description: Sparkling sequin-embellished blouse with crew neck. Stretch mesh backing for comfort. Hand wash to preserve delicate detailing.

name: Cropped Hoodie
description: Casual streetwear hoodie with kangaroo pocket. Cropped length shows midriff. 80% cotton/20% polyester fleece interior.

name: Chiffon Poet Blouse
description: Romantic blouse with billowy sleeves and ruffled cuffs. Keyhole neckline with satin ribbon tie. Semi-sheer - layer over camisole.

name: High-Waisted Skinny Jeans
description: Stretch denim jeans with 28-inch inseam. Dark wash with minimal distressing. Mid-weight fabric holds its shape all day.

name: Pleated Midi Skirt
description: Waist-defining skirt with accordion pleats. Hits below the knee for modest coverage. Lined to prevent static cling.

name: Linen Wide-Leg Pants
description: Breathable linen pants with elastic waistband. Flowy wide legs create elegant silhouette. Wrinkles naturally for relaxed look.

name: Leather Leggings
description: Faux leather leggings with high-waisted design. Matte finish with subtle stretch. Pair with oversized sweaters for balance.

name: Denim Shorts
description: Distressed denim cutoffs with 3-inch inseam. Mid-rise waist and frayed hem. Light wash perfect for summer.

name: Tailored Trousers
description: Office-ready pants with creased front. Straight leg and zip-fly closure. Wool blend resists wrinkles during workday.

name: Corduroy Mini Skirt
description: Retro-inspired skirt with fine wale texture. Button-front closure and A-line shape. Pairs well with tights in cooler months.

name: Yoga Joggers
description: Athleisure sweatpants with drawstring waist. Brushed interior feels soft against skin. Side pockets hold essentials.

name: Paperbag Waist Pants
description: Trendy high-waisted pants with self-tie belt. Pleated front creates volume. Tapered leg elongates silhouette.

name: Tulle Layered Skirt
description: Romantic voluminous skirt with satin lining. Multiple layers of stiff tulle create dramatic shape. Waistband sits at natural waist.

name: Oversized Denim Jacket
description: Classic light-wash jacket with slouchy fit. Distressed detailing adds character. Roll-up cuffs for adjustable sleeve length.

name: Wool Blend Coat
description: Double-breasted camel coat with notch lapel. Fully lined with interior pockets. Mid-thigh length provides warmth.

name: Faux Leather Moto Jacket
description: Edgy biker-style jacket with zippered pockets. Asymmetrical zip front and stand collar. Water-resistant polyurethane material.

name: Quilted Puffer Jacket
description: Lightweight winter jacket with hood. Filled with synthetic insulation for warmth. Water-repellent shell fabric.

name: Trench Coat
description: Classic beige trench with removable belt. Storm flap and gun flap details. Water-resistant cotton gabardine fabric.

name: Cropped Blazer
description: Structured work blazer with padded shoulders. Dual button closure and flap pockets. Hits at natural waist for modern silhouette.

name: Fleece Zip-Up
description: Cozy casual jacket with stand-up collar. Kangaroo pocket keeps hands warm. Brushed interior feels soft against skin.

name: Rain Mac
description: Waterproof raincoat with adjustable hood. Ventilated underarms prevent overheating. Packable into included pouch.

name: Faux Fur Coat
description: Luxurious winter coat with shawl collar. Plush synthetic fibers mimic real fur. Deep pockets for cold hands.

name: Bomber Jacket
description: Sporty ribbed-trim jacket with zip front. Satin exterior with quilted lining. Elasticized cuffs and hem.

name: Leather Crossbody Bag
description: Compact black leather bag with adjustable strap. Multiple compartments organize essentials. Gold-tone hardware accents.

name: Wide-Brim Fedora
description: Stylish sun hat with grosgrain ribbon band. Structured crown maintains shape. 100% wool felt material.

name: Silk Scarf
description: Printed luxury scarf with hand-rolled edges. Versatile accessory for hair, neck or bag. Comes with care instructions.

name: Gold Hoop Earrings
description: Medium-sized hoops with secure latch backing. Hypoallergenic surgical steel with gold plating. Diameter measures 1.5 inches.

name: Leather Belt
description: Classic brown belt with brushed nickel buckle. Genuine leather develops patina over time. Fits waist sizes 26-30 inches.

name: Oversized Sunglasses
description: Cat-eye sunnies with UV400 protection. Lightweight acetate frames. Includes microfiber storage pouch.

name: Knit Beanie
description: Winter wool hat with folded cuff. Unisex one-size-fits-most design. Machine washable for easy care.

name: Statement Necklace
description: Chunky gold necklace with geometric pendant. Adjustable chain length from 16-18 inches. Lead and nickel free.

name: Woven Straw Bag
description: Summer beach tote with leather handles. Lined interior with zippered pocket. Natural raffia material.

name: Cashmere Gloves
description: Soft winter gloves with touchscreen fingertips. Ribbed cuffs prevent cold air entry. 100% pure cashmere.

name: Ankle Boots
description: Chunky heel boots with side zipper. Genuine suede upper with rubber sole. 2.5 inch block heel for all-day comfort.

name: White Sneakers
description: Classic canvas shoes with vulcanized rubber sole. Lace-up closure with padded collar. Ortholite insole provides cushioning.

name: Strappy Sandals
description: Summer leather sandals with adjustable ankle straps. Cushioned footbed molds to your feet. 1 inch wedge for subtle lift.

name: Leather Loafers
description: Sophisticated slip-ons with tassel detail. Cushioned insole and flexible outsole. Perfect for business casual outfits.

name: High Heel Pumps
description: Pointed-toe work heels with 3.5 inch stiletto. Leather lining prevents blisters. Non-slip rubber toe piece.

name: Hiking Boots
description: Waterproof outdoor boots with Vibram sole. Ankle support and gusseted tongue keep debris out. Break-in period required.

name: Ballet Flats
description: Comfortable everyday flats with bow detail. Padded insole and flexible sole. Available in multiple colors.

name: Platform Sandals
description: 90s-inspired platforms with 2 inch sole. Adjustable ankle strap for secure fit. Lightweight EVA material.

name: Running Shoes
description: Cushioned athletic shoes with breathable mesh. Responsive foam midsole absorbs impact. Reflective details for night visibility.

name: Espadrille Wedges
description: Summer rope-soled wedges with 3 inch heel. Canvas upper with lace-up detail. Not recommended for wet weather.
